Activity: Check emails and address urgent requests related to the EHR modifications.
Review yesterday's progress and plan for today's tasks.
Work on implementing the order sets for influenza testing and antiviral medications within the EHR system, following the specifications drafted yesterday. Coordinate with @EHRDEV-1, @EHRDEV-2.

Email @DA-1, @DA-2 (Data Analysts) asking about the current seasonal influenza trend analysis for the community, and its comparison with historical data. Request a brief presentation on the trend analysis for a meeting with physicians on Thursday.
Meet with @EHRV-1 (EHR Vendor Liaison) to discuss potential challenges and solutions related to implementing the order sets within the EHR system. Clarify any technical specifications.
Lunch break. Enjoy a walk outside with colleagues.
Refine the influenza testing and antiviral medication order sets based on the EHR vendor's input and clinical guidelines. Ensure the order sets are user-friendly for physicians.

Email @TRAINER-1 (Training Coordinator) to discuss plans for training physicians on the new influenza-related EHR functionalities. Schedule a training session for next week. Discuss the key points to be covered in the session, the target audience and the logistics of the training.
Document the progress on the influenza order set implementation. Address any outstanding issues or questions.
Prepare materials for physician awareness campaign, highlighting the new influenza guidelines and recommendations in the EHR system.
